=== Diary Summary: 2025-04-12 ===

### April 12, 2025 - Initiation of Voice Diary Project

Today marks the start of my voice diary project. I recorded a test message on my desktop to ensure everything was functioning properly. Shortly after, I repeated the test message, reinforcing my commitment to this new endeavor. This dual recording serves as a foundational step toward documenting my thoughts and experiences moving forward.
